title: Michał Sławuta
text: Michał Sławuta (born February 10, 1977) is a Polish former <a href="soccer">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> and currently a goalkeeper coach for <a href="FC%20Haka">FC Haka</a> in <a href="Ykk%C3%B6nen">Ykkönen</a>, the second highest level of football in <a href="Finland">Finland</a>.
